# freeCodeCamp-palindrome-checker

[![Bulma](https://img.shields.io/badge/Bulma-0.9.4-00d1b2?logo=data:image/png;base64,)](https://bulma.io) [![Node-Sass 9.0](https://img.shields.io/badge/Node--Sass-9.0-%23c6538c.svg)](https://www.npmjs.com/package/node-sass)

Solution to freeCodeCamp's Palindrome Checker project using JavaScript, and Bulma CSS customized in Node-Sass.
